Address.value: 6595 S JONES BOULEVARD, LAS VEGAS, Nevada, 89118, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Golden Entertainment Inc is a US-based company that focuses on distributed gaming, casino, and resort operations. Its reportable segments are Nevada Casino Resorts, Nevada Locals Casinos, Maryland Casino Resort and Distributed Gaming. It derives key revenue from the Nevada Casino Resorts and Distributed Gaming segments. Nevada Casino Resorts is comprised of destination casino resort properties offering a variety of food and beverage outlets, entertainment venues and other amenities. Distributed Gaming segment is comprised of the operation of slot machines and amusement devices in non-casino locations across Nevada and Montana, with a limited number of slot machines in each location, as well as the operation of branded taverns.

value.name: Blake L. Sartini
